name: BitMonsters Closed Alpha (v0.1)
description:
Epic Battles await in this turn-based stategy game, filled with cool enemies that will try to stop you from defeating the dark goblin king. (It all just makes sense!)

There are some plans for more worlds, but that will only happen if enough people have played it.

Do you want to play the beta? Message me on Instagram!

https://www.instagram.com/j1p_de_k1p/
